long_description: Fully outfitted with fenders, rack and kickstand, the Yuba Mundo is a sturdy workhorse, carrying cargo to and fro with ease. It's a great alternative means of transportation for errands or commutes. This edition of the Mundo includes extras that offer great value: includes utlity deck, fenders, rack, kickstand, front-tire stability spring for parking, and wheelskirts. Rear rack features smooth bamboo decking that small passengers can straddle and ride at low speeds. Steel runners along the base offer a convenient place for passenger's feet. Extended steel frame offers the strength, stiffness and stability necessary for hauling heavy loads-whether it's the kids, groceries or sweet flea market finds. Frame-integrated rear rack is extremely sturdy and offers plenty of lashing points for securing cargo; bamboo decking provides frame protection and load support. Frame and wheels are disc-brake ready for easy upgrading down the road; frame can also support a battery for an electric-assist upgrade (not included). Oversized, 2-legged kickstand provides plenty of stability and keeps the bike upright when loading passengers and cargo or parking the bike. Specialized spring mechanism called a "Deflopilator" keeps front tire from flopping around while bike is parked. Triple crankset is matched up with a 7-speed cassette to offer 21 cargo-hauling gear combinations to ease pedaling. Sturdy 26 in. wheels are built around stout hubs with 48-hole rear and 36-hole front lacing to ensure supportive, lasting performance carrying heavy loads over rough roads. Finer details include front and rear fenders, a cushy seat, swept-back handlebar and a bell to alert others to your presence. Also includes wheelskirts to keep shoelaces and loose clothing out of rear spokes if a passenger is sitting on rear rack. Please note: the Yuba Mundo cargo bike has an upper weight limit of 440 lbs. of rear cargo, plus the rider.
